Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: Once it's in your body there's not much you can do, though in theory a significant % should be metabolized by now. You can do things to help with the symptoms (hydration, some food to try to settle the stomach) but sfaik its just got to work it's way through, similar to with alcohol. If you're feeling significant cardiac symptoms though, checking with a doc is never a bad idea, especially if your overall health is in a less-than-optimal place.
